website_summaries.verdict: Look no further if you're trying to find a colander for rinsing dry rice or quinoa.
pros: Set of three strainers measuring 2.75, 4.72, and 7 inches
Made of sturdy anti-corrosion stainless steel
Mesh is small enough for rinsing dry rice and quinoa
Even seeds stay in the strainer

customer_reviews.title: NOT STAINLESS STEEL
customer_reviews.text: LIES! Product is described as stainless steel. Paid for stainless steel, got aluminium!!!! Pissed! Could have gone to 99cent store. Dont buy these
customer_reviews.author: robyn tialavea

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: I needed these for kombucha to strain the little remnants of scoby and any other fruit particles. Pros Great quality Great price- there were three different sizes and it was only a few dollar more than one from IKEA Dishwasher safe Versatile- I use for baking, baby food, kombucha, pasta Cons Three different things to hold on to, I wish it was one that could be expanded to different sizes
customer_reviews.author: YouStoleMyShirts

customer_reviews.title: Good quality produuct
customer_reviews.text: Easily strained the skin from my baby’s peas leaving only creamy insides.
customer_reviews.author: tay7207

customer_reviews.title: Fresh drinks and perfectly sifted flour
customer_reviews.text: These are great for sifting small amounts of flour or larger amounts of flour! I've used mine for drinks teas and pasta but beware, if you're cooking up an entire standard box of pasta, the larger strainer might be a smidge small. Still an amazing set though! We love ours!
customer_reviews.author: Vero

customer_reviews.title: No rusting or tearing
customer_reviews.text: I have had strainers before this where the mesh tore away from the frame, but this seems very sturdy, no tearing or becoming bent out of shape. I also had a strainer where the handle broke under the weight of a cup of rice, that will definitely not be a problem with these. I also had one that rusted, but that is also not a problem with these. I've had so many bad strainers that these make me happy every time I use them.
customer_reviews.author: KeM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent SS Fine Mesh Strainers
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. Stainless Steel fine mesh strainers. 3 sizes for different uses. They are not very deep, but they work great for straining broth for making sauces and gravies. My previous strainer melted when straining a hot liquid, because it was not stainless steel like this set. I would definitely recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: LR700

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for what I need
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy that I bought this strainer set. I was cooking quinoa today and I didn't realize that you have to rinse it before use. All my other strainers had holes that were too big. This one was perfect. I will also use it for sifting powdered sugar and rinsing all fruits and veggies. It's a sturdy set that will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Dora Farkas

customer_reviews.title: Fine for a noob
customer_reviews.text: Well I'm a noob when it comes to baking, however the few times I have used these strainers I have had zero problems with them. I read comments about the mesh not being deep enough but they are fine to me, then again I use them at home and I do not bake big portions. Aside from that the mesh is fine and it is the same mesh in the whole set, they don't look cheaply made as well.
customer_reviews.author: OGMudbone

customer_reviews.title: Great price for well-made and weighty products
customer_reviews.text: My questionable all-plastic sieve set from Walmart recently bit the dust and I decided for my next one I wanted ones that were all metal and had a bit more durability and weight to them. These fit the bill for a good price, and work exactly as expected. They are easy to use, easy to clean, and I expect them to hold up for a long time. I would recommend these. Blessings!
customer_reviews.author: A Branch

customer_reviews.title: Handle breaks easly.
customer_reviews.text: Falls apart easily. Hate to say junk but they are! the spot welds on the handle don't hold up at all..! Just give it a racking or twisting & you will find out.
customer_reviews.author: jon brown & karen houts

customer_reviews.title: Ouch! My finger
customer_reviews.text: There was a sharp edge on one of the spot welds and when I pulled the set from the plastic, I got a tiny slice on my finger. No big deal, I just ground it with my Dremel and it's smooth now. I guess the take-away is that these might not have the highest level of QC. That being said, functionally, they're just what I wanted and expected.
customer_reviews.author: Dale R. Seng

customer_reviews.title: Total garbage - however customer service is great
customer_reviews.text: This is poorly constructed, was about to use it for the first time and the handle came off, it's not welded correctly glad it happened on the first usage so I can return it and get my money back to buy one that is decent. *** Update *** After posting my review, I was contacted by customer service, they offered replacement and very quickly sent it, the new strainer looks very sturdy and so far so good. I have revised my score and changed it to 4 start based solely on the customer service received from this company and how they approached my complaint. Thank you Good Assistant team
customer_reviews.author: J. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: handle OFF!
customer_reviews.text: The handle on the 8" strainer came off. Will not re-purchase this brand.
customer_reviews.author: duckydee

customer_reviews.title: Quinoa Strainer!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a fine mesh strainer so that I could wash Quinoa. This was just what I needed. I have used them for just that purpose and for dusting cakes, and such with cocoa powder, and powdered sugar. Nicely put together and strong.
customer_reviews.author: Cremekat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The mesh part does stain if you strain fruit puree through them, but that doesn't bother me. They are easy to clean and have not torn at the outer ring connection so I think they are pretty strong, because I am not gentle with them.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Not great for sifting flour but does the job
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal for 3 strainers but I bought these to use for baking. Sifting powdered sugar and flour and this strainer isn’t the easiest. It only holds about 1 cups worth and it doesn’t sift very easily. I’ve had easier strainers but again this does the job. After being contacted by the seller, and allowing to give my feedback I have added another star to this review - I appreciate a company that is willing to reach out and make sure its customers are satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: SloanCollins

customer_reviews.title: Quality stand-in strainder
customer_reviews.text: Good strainers for the price. Not the sturdiest I have ever used, but good for the price. Notably, it's good to have a small one so you don't have to break out the big strainer every time you need to strain a can of veggies.
customer_reviews.author: scottb

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These are decent strainers. The mesh isn't as fine as I had hoped but will work, it is the standard wire mesh. They have held up very well to the dishwasher with no signs of rusting or discoloration.
customer_reviews.author: Kat M.

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I hate giving critical reviews but these are absolute garbage. The handle snapped off where it is spot welded onto the strainer on it's very first use. Maybe a stronger weld folks.
customer_reviews.author: Ordinary Average Guy

customer_reviews.title: Just okay, better options out there
customer_reviews.text: I like these but the little nub on the end makes them difficult to maneuver. It gets in the way all the time. I wouldn't recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: cannibal

customer_reviews.title: Way smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I guess it's not the product's fault I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5, but when these strainers were delivered, I have to admit, I was disappointed. They are much smaller than I had expected and they aren't deep at all. I can't see straining pasta in one of these. I ended up going out and purchasing another one that is larger and deeper. Now that all that is said, I will say, they are well-made and I am keeping them for this reason. I am sure I can find something I can strain that I can use these for.
customer_reviews.author: hbrittingham

customer_reviews.title: Ugh!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh man these sieves took such a long time to sift my almond flour through I started to get frustrated with it. Also have to clean it twice when I used it cause it tends to get stuck in the fine mesh. Would not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Burton

customer_reviews.title: Work until they break
customer_reviews.text: Handle broke off spilling pasta everywhere. They work fine until they break during use. Would not recommend. Seller is replacing even though they are just out of the one year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: OHP

customer_reviews.title: Very useful trio of strainers
customer_reviews.text: This trio of strainers is perfect for small pastas like orzo. The set is not unique and I found a comparable trio at Costco which looked exactly the same. But for convenience of ordering and delivery, this set works great. They stack together and while not collapsible because they are metal mesh, they do stack and take up less space.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mike

customer_reviews.title: RUSTED IN JUST THREE WASHES!!!
customer_reviews.text: Rusted all three of the strainers just after 3 washes. Isn’t stainless steel supposed to be rust free? So many reviews on this item but none if them say this, I am surprised. Please refrain from buying rust possibilities steel and using them!
customer_reviews.author: Mansi

customer_reviews.title: Multi-function
customer_reviews.text: I'm using these alot...tea strainer, colander to wash and hold berries, temporary bowl cover. It has a tight weave. Water drains well but catches scum/foam from broth and soups. Someone already suggested having different weave on each size, but definitely keep the tightest weave on the smallest one.
customer_reviews.author: KarenGP

customer_reviews.title: I gave this as a gift and was very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Patrick's partner here. I gave this as a gift and was very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick and Christa

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: After only a few uses the spot welds holding the handle to the basket came apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Appreciate the size, quality, & price of these
customer_reviews.text: These are so well made. I love having the three sizes. The arm is well enough scaled that they can even balance on some vessels. Small enough mesh to hold quinoa & broccoli seeds. The company emailed to check on how the order went, which was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: 6 stars based on product and after sales support.
customer_reviews.text: Received the order. We accidentally got 2 of the same size. Candice from after sales support immediately contacted me back to replace the item. She sent it within a day and we were delighted to get the full set of 3. The smaller of the 3 is perfect for when you're baking with flour or icing sugar and will definitely be great for drip tea or coffee. The other 2 are also very versatile. I included a picture of the back. I would give this product 6 stars just based on the customer support and quality. Heads up: The mesh is firm and ridged. Which is a plus for me!!
customer_reviews.author: Gerhard Barnard

customer_reviews.title: Received with corrosion in the packaging!
customer_reviews.text: Opened up the packaging and immediately noticed some fine orange lines on all three strainers along the rim and handles. Thought this was maybe something left over from factory and washed them off. Dried the strainers and checked them a few days later. It was corrosion. Not sure if a supplier changed, but what I received was certainly not stainless!
customer_reviews.author: A. Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! well made and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Fine mesh allows for sifting flour and everything you may need. I like the three sizes. Very happy with the product and specially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Aileen F.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: These strainers were exactly what I wanted! I love the fine mesh. Perfect for straining and/or rinsing seeds and grains. Not deep strainers, so don't plan on using them to strain large pans of pasta - use your colander for that job!
customer_reviews.author: Tropicfive

customer_reviews.title: Mesh screen is fine and works well
customer_reviews.text: Mesh screen is fine and works well. However, the metal handle broke off where it attaches to the circular rim of the screen. I still use the fine mesh screen, but must hold it by the metal rim, since the handle broke off.
customer_reviews.author: odysseus

customer_reviews.title: Items are great
customer_reviews.text: Strainers are terrific. One item was damaged and it was replaced quickly
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my need!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed them for. I can't say the actual hole size, but they're pretty tiny, not super fine, but about half as wide as a grain of rice is narrow (i.e. if you cut a grain of rice long ways). Very sturdy and hild up to some solid whacks and smacks wothout bending. very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Larson

customer_reviews.title: Much needed
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to get these locally for some time an the local store never have them, well they shouldn’t complain about on line sales because they don’t keep the inventories. Great item !
customer_reviews.author: JME

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: These strainers have works for straining pasta, fruit and other foods. But the most surprising and helpful use has been for straining coffee grounds used in our french press. Every day my husband using the medium strainer to dump the grounds from the french press, strain them, then to the organics bin. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Used for cooking.
customer_reviews.text: The item itself wasn’t deep enough. I wanted to use it has a strainer for fruit or lettuce. This strainer is better for cooking. So if you are frying in oil. This item would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Marley

customer_reviews.title: No more flour lumps or uneven sugar sprinkling!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set! I love the diversity of sizes. These have been great for cleaning rice, sifting flour, sprinkling powdered sugar, etc. Dishwasher safe, sturdy, really nice overall.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Quality product...
customer_reviews.text: This set of strainers is a great value. They are made of quality material, are dishwasher safe and stack for storing. The largest one is a bit smaller than I expected, but that's my fault for not looking closely at the measurements. I will look for this same product in a larger size to complete my set.
customer_reviews.author: Debby66

customer_reviews.title: Strainers work perfectly, but weld points are very weak
customer_reviews.text: Everything about these strainers is wonderful except the weld points as two of the strainers have experienced fails in the handle leaving them with no handle ... thus, worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: GOOD CUSTOMER SERVICE ...
customer_reviews.text: Strainer works good, but after in the 3rd time I used, the handle weld broke. Bad quality weld. UPDATE: VERY GOOD CUSTOMER SERVICE, they do their best to help the customers, they asked " ... give me the chance to make things right for you ..."
customer_reviews.author: sarete d

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These seem great quality. I ended up returning them because I got a different strainer before they came, But I wish I wouldn’t ha e a kept these. They seem great quality for price and nice to have three.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie

customer_reviews.title: Handy little strainers
customer_reviews.text: These are handy little strainers, and will be helpful in the kitchen. I would give them 5 stars, except they are shipped "loose" (or at least that's how they were shipped in my order). Somebody packed them in a carton with two 6-packs of 1-liter bottle water (heavy product), and no packing material. One of the handles broke off in shipping. It was easy to repair, however, with a mini torch. Despite the screens being crushed out of shape in transit, the rims were intact, and the screens were easy to push back into shape and appear unharmed. If you need/want small strainers, these are good ones.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thornburg

customer_reviews.title: handy set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set of strainers four years ago and they are still as good as new. I don't use them that often, but it is good to know that I have them when needed. I find the three sizes to be perfect for my various needs. I always wash immediately after using.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: would have loved a sturdier handle such as wood
customer_reviews.text: basic sizes for everyday household needs. are fairly deep for its uses and can strain all of my needs. use them to strain different types of food and are effective for removing heavier items. would have loved a sturdier handle such as wood. but overall a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Leal

customer_reviews.title: Broken on arrival
customer_reviews.text: The handle was already falling off the largest strainer when I opened the packaging, and fell off completely when I tried to lift it up by the handle. If it is already that unstable with nothing in it, I don't think it would be useful for straining anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sieve ya later!
customer_reviews.text: I have been living without anything like this for so long, now it’s hard to imagine life without them! These sieves are amazing. The mesh is very fine so it gets every job done that you could think of. I use them to strain eggs for poaching as well as sifting flour for baking. They came very well packaged and no damage whatsoever. I think these are a great buy and am glad to add to my collection of kitchen utensils.
customer_reviews.author: Anya

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new strainer. I like to sift my powdered sugar into a container to get the lumps out but the holes are tighter and it takes longer to sift but it is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: CAKELADY

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace old broken strainer and tried this combo pack. Very happy with them, so far. They seem to be good quality and I cannot complain about the price. I recommend them
customer_reviews.author: BigBlock

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy, stainless Steel strainer
customer_reviews.text: I have had no issues since I purchased this item. It works really well for removing pulp from liquid when I make nut milks and in this case tamarind juice. I leave it in water overnight sometimes and so far no signs of rust. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for washing/straining quinoa,
customer_reviews.text: This works wonderful to strain quinoa ! Quinoa gets wasted and ruined if you don't wash it in the right Type of strainer. This one is perfect for quinoa and Small berries
customer_reviews.author: Blondegrrl

customer_reviews.title: the biggest strainer works well with straining when i rinse ...
customer_reviews.text: the biggest strainer works well with straining when i rinse quinoa and the small one works well when straining tea leaves when i transfer my tea into my hydroflask.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Decent but Small Baskets
customer_reviews.text: The strainer basket is not as full as I had hoped. Which makes it more difficult to clean. It does its job, just seems doesn’t hold as much food to strain at one time. The mesh is very tight and does catch fine particles, which is good.
customer_reviews.author: Deanne Jones

customer_reviews.title: Highly Durable
customer_reviews.text: Depending on what you use them for, the double layer can make cleaning difficult... especially if you decide to hands press cranberry sauce to get the perfect homemade cranberry jelly. That's my fault though. The product quality is great and I vouch for the durability too after standing up to 8 pounds of hand pressing cranberry sauce!
customer_reviews.author: Katheren Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Fine product
customer_reviews.text: Handy set. I use them for everything. The largest is particularly good for my needs. Would buy them again but doubt that I will need to do that. They are sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jane M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Strainers
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be very well made and professional quality. Nice stainless steel and a good variety of sizes. I feel like a professional cook using them!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela S. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great value for cost
customer_reviews.text: High quality mesh strainers, plenty of liquid flow for rinsing rice, but tight enough for use with powdered sugar. Having a lip on the edge is irritating to clean, but not as bad as other brands.
customer_reviews.author: UTMorpheus

customer_reviews.title: few scratches on the rim
customer_reviews.text: they are solid and the mesh does very good job, Good sizes too. just black scratches along the rims i wonder if they will rust sooner
customer_reviews.author: thechef

customer_reviews.title: A very good product but poor shipping practices
customer_reviews.text: These strainers were just as I expected and a great product. My only complaint was they were shipped in a box with other products and were bent when received. The manufacturer should provide their own box to prevent this from happening. If not, then Amazon should know enough to provide protection for the strainers from being damaged in transit.
customer_reviews.author: A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Strainer set
customer_reviews.text: I really like this strainer set. The long handle keeps my hands from the hot liquid, and they have a place on the end where you can hang them up neatly. I highly recommend these as they are very well made and having a variety of sizes makes things much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Nice mesh
customer_reviews.text: Mesh is tight. Works well for rinsing berries. Not that I needed all 3, but the price makes it worth it. I hand wash and let it dry. It's hard to keep water stains off of the shiny rim.
customer_reviews.author: jmumv

customer_reviews.title: Strainer
customer_reviews.text: Good quality!! 3 different sizes are just good for liquids & flour strainer,looks sturdy
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: At long last a set of fine smaller size strainers with nice taut screening material
customer_reviews.text: At long last a set of fine smaller size strainers with nice taut screening material. I am in love.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful!
customer_reviews.text: It's nice having three sizes....though I wasn't sure if I'd really use them all. They arrived in damaged and have been very useful for anything from straining my loose tea and boiled pasta to sifting flour or confectioners sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Look ... Haven't Used, Yet
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used, yet. Smaller than I wanted, but will keep them, anyway. They "look' much better ... higher quality than those at my local Swap Meet
customer_reviews.author: James A. Ristow

customer_reviews.title: NOT stainless steel, rusted within a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: Should have figured that for this price it wouldn't be real stainless steal. But within a few weeks of using this to wash rice and quinoa - and never putting these in the dishwasher - they rusted, and the handles became loose on the largest one as well. Total junk. *Edit: I was sent a replacement by the seller after the review (one additional star), which is appreciated. Will update this review if the replacement set performs better than the first.
customer_reviews.author: Elay Shech

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I needed these for rinsing small grains. The work perfectly,
customer_reviews.author: boyandgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great product and fits perfectly around jars
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I bought them for making my elderberry syrup and they fit perfectly around the glass jar for draining.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: 3 different kinds and they are perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was one ☝️ very good thing that I have bought and you have 3 three different kinds for you to pick the right one ☝️ for what you want to achieve in a fine Mesh Strainer
customer_reviews.author: Travis Trower

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE SO NICE. EVERYONE SHOULD HAVE A SET IN THEIR KITCHEN
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE SO NICE. EVERYONE SHOULD HAVE A SET IN THEIR KITCHEN. AND WHAT A DEAL. WHAT YOU WOULD PAY FOR ONE STAINER, YOU GET THREE VERY NICE STURDY STRAINERS THAT ARE GOING TO LAST FOR A LONG TIME.
customer_reviews.author: ELLEN BLEAU

customer_reviews.title: Works great for rice
customer_reviews.text: This works great for rice and draining meat. I have needed one of these for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Zuspan

customer_reviews.title: Good, sturdy Strainers. Right sizes
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy product. Strain holes are perfect. I like the sturdy ring that surrounds the strainers & the handles.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for rinsing Quinoa and Jewelry!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! They are perfect for rinsing Quinoa. I love that they are a 3 pack - I also make jewelry so I have the larger one designated to wash my jewelry clean of chemicals and it is perfect for the job!
customer_reviews.author: Yellowflowerchild

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to strain my daughters baby food. Perfect for that but blueberries can get caught and make it hard to clean
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality and useful
customer_reviews.text: I love that the mesh is double-layered which makes it great for straining fine grains. I bought it to strain my coffee grounds from my french press to keep the grounds out of my septic system. It works perfectly! I like that it came with 3 sizes, so I am sure I will find many uses for them.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: very well made with lot of uses
customer_reviews.text: Very nice mesh strainers, they came in 3 different sizes and are perfect for loose tea or straining things with seeds in them to keep seeds out of your liquid if making homemade tomato juice or puree. They came very quickly on time as promised and are very well made
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: good price
customer_reviews.text: they're strainers. they do there job.. they strain. use them for drying herbs after washing and to catch seeds from fruit. and for sifting cocoa and flour
customer_reviews.author: Karen W.

customer_reviews.title: The stainless steel quality is outstanding
customer_reviews.text: The design, workmanship, and the double fine screen on all of the strainers is very impressive. This product stands out as an excellent choice for your straining needs in your kitchen
customer_reviews.author: richardklop

customer_reviews.title: It's a pretty basic product
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty basic product. It does what it's supposed to do. I use it for straining tea mostly, and sometime straining the liquid out of other foods that need to be drained. The 3 sizes take care of just about everything I need.
customer_reviews.author: vjblather

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I wish the handles would fold or come off. Otherwise very nice sturdy product. Really tight strainer, nothing gets through except water.
customer_reviews.author: Jb h

customer_reviews.title: VERY fine
customer_reviews.text: Too fine for almond flour. Well, not TOO fine, just... too fine for making macarons unless you want to sift out like half the almond flour
customer_reviews.author: Kris Teen

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable and work so well. I love these in my kitchen and use them often
customer_reviews.author: Lena Khash

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: For $12, I wasn't sure whether it'd feel flimsy and break easily. We have only used it for about a month, but so far it feels solid and good quality. The biggest one was a bit shallow; check dimensions carefully or you may be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Signoret

customer_reviews.title: Great value and well made!
customer_reviews.text: I'm probably more excited than I should be about this purchase because it's one of those things I've wanted and needed for years and just never got around to buying. I had no idea I'd have uses for all three sizes. Wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Allison62

customer_reviews.title: Stronger than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Loveee these! Def use them more than I expected. But really like how sturdy they are
customer_reviews.author: Jessica J

customer_reviews.title: I greatly recommend them.
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that these come in a set of different sizes. They are very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Maricela H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: These work very well for me and were great quality for the price. I've used these for several weeks now and none have broken.
customer_reviews.author: Jolynn.Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: Poorly built total waste of money, falls apart with minimal use
customer_reviews.author: Erica G.Gibbs Easy

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it’s made for and great price and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, well made, good price. Exactly what I was looking for. The larger size is perfect for when I strain grains and the smallest one for sprinkling powdered sugar! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee

customer_reviews.title: Great strainers
customer_reviews.text: Works great for quinoa, rice, and straining stock. I just wish the biggest one were twice the size.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: I have to say these work great for that and I'm very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to strain the coffee grounds from my French Press to avoid pouring them down my drain. I have to say these work great for that and I'm very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: perfect colanders
customer_reviews.text: 3 different sizes, nice and sturdy, mesh feels nice and heavy-duty
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what it is
customer_reviews.text: I mostly use the largest one to wash beans and rice, but it does exactly what it's supposed to do and you lose nothing through the holes.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Perfect strainers
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. I love the small strainer to sift my tea, larger ones for washing berries. Seems sturdy. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: High quality screen holds shape.
customer_reviews.text: Well made strainers, screen is very tight and holds its shape so it's easy to squeegie material through it and clean it after use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I use those almost everyday and still look good after 5 months. Well made.

product_meta.title: IPOW Set of 3 Stainless Steel Fine Mesh Strainer, Colander Sieve Sifters with Long Handle for Kitchen Food, Small Medium Large Size for Tea Coffee Powder Fry Juice Rice Vegetable Fruit Etc
product_meta.description:
Updated! Sturdier anti-corrosion steel, Increase the thickness of mesh and handle connection, no risk for dropping. premium-grade material, confident-buy! 

Strainers are an essential tool in any busy kitchen; not only can they be used for straining pasta, but they can be used for a variety of tasks such as rinsing grains and beans, and fruits and straining pasta, rice, lentils, jams, lumpy sauces and any other food preparation. This strainer features a sturdy outer framework and handle.The concave net catches food items securely while releasing water, oil and other residue.The smooth, polished steel ring rests evenly atop bowls and pots so that you can multi-task while your food drains and strains,So you can't miss it. 

product Feature: 
A Fine mesh strainer is perfect for skimming and draining stock and sauces or straining loose tea leaves. 
B Strong stainless steel construction for optimal performance. 
C Convenient hanging hole for storage. 
D Fine mesh for straining sauces and powdered sugar. 
E the set of 3 strainers is perfect for sifting and straining wet or dry ingredients. 
F Dishwasher-safe 

Dimensions: 
Come with 3 different size mesh is very convenient to choose for your kitchen. 
Small size:2 75 inch wide with a 2inch bowl, 1 25 inch deep, 5 inch handle, 1.2 oz 
Middle size:4 72 inch wide with a 4inch bowl, 2 inch deep, 5.12 inch handle, 2.2 oz 
large size:7 inch wide with a 6 3/8inch bowl, 2.5 inch deep, 6.25 inch handle, 3.7 oz 


Items Included:
Pack of 3 Strainers
feature_bullets: DURABLE, ANTI-CORROSION, RUST RESISTANT - This upgrade fine mesh strainer is made of premium stainless steel and the thickness of mesh is increased. It won’t rust, corrode, bend or warp and stands up to both daily kitchen trifles and the rigors of a professional kitchen.

THREE PERFECT SIZE FOR All STRAINING TASK - With three diameters (2.8”, 4.8” & 7.3”) of our colanders, you will be more efficient in the kitchen and always have the perfect strainers and sifters for tea, coffee, flour, sugar, spices, rice, cocoa powder; clumpy dry baby cereals, ground oatmeal, fry; pasta noodle, fruit, bean, vegetables, juice etc.

EXTRA FINE MESH, FAST DRAINING, EASY CLEANING - Our special designed weaving rim net contributes to extra fine tiny mesh holes, thus helps the food drain fast and ensures maximum retention of small particles, efficiently saved the cleaning time and no more waste of food.

CONVENIENT LONG HANDLE AND HANGING EAR - Sturdy double rod construction and long handle increase the loading capacity of the strainer and protect you from scalding when fishing out the fry from hot oil. With the hanging ear, you can easily hang them in the kitchen or rest the strainer on any pot, pan or cup without worrying about slipping.

HIGH RESPONSIBILITY AFTER SALE SERVICE - IPOW stainless steel fine mesh strainer enjoys quick customer services. For any issue, please contact us anytime. Our professional customer service will surely help you out efficiently until you are satisfied.
